mapper.select: SELECT A.NUM , A.TITLE , A.WRITER , A.CNTN , A.ANSWER_YN , DATE_FORMAT(A.DB_INS_TM , '%Y-%m-%d') AS dbInsTm , B.ANS_TITLE , B.ANS_CNTN , B.CNSR_ID , B.CNSR_NM , DATE_FORMAT(B.ANS_DB_INS_TM , '%Y-%m-%d') AS ansDbInsTm FROM GS_CNS_ASK AS A LEFT JOIN GS_CNS_ASK_ANS AS B ON A.NUM = B.NUM WHERE A.CNSLE_ID = #{cnsleId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO GS_CNS_ASK ( PW , TITLE , CNTN , WRITER , CNSLE_ID , VIEW_CNT , ANSWER_YN , DB_INS_TM ) VALUES ( #{pw} , #{title} , #{cntn} , #{writer} , #{cnsleId} , '0' , 'N' , NOW() )
